bookText.htmlContent: Safi'jiiva are evolved form of Xeno'jiiva, a dragon absorbing the bioenergy of dead elder dragons to grow its own.

Safi'jiiva's ability to manipulate the energy created from its heat organ allows Safi'jiiva to terraform the surroundings. It can aquire so much energy that it could destroy the entire planet and is called "the emperor of elder dragons" or "The sapphire star". If one were to go berserk, the entire planet could be heavily affected if not completely reshaped.
